    A Small Compendium on Graphs in R

    Vignette Author

    2018-12-04

    graph_compendium.Rmd

    I wrote this vignette mostly for myself, to remind me how to deal with graph representation of panicles in R.

    This is not a general introduction about graphs in R. It is a practical note on the graph functions and operations that are used in this package.

    We have included examples of such files in this package. You can access these examples **online* here or locally in the ptrapr/extdata folder 1

    1. Locate your local package folder with the function: find.folder(ptrapr)↩

    Developed by Otho Mantegazza.

    Site built with pkgdown.
